title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about unsupervised machine translation. The list should include reviews about machine translation

author.literal: "Unsupervised Machine Translation" by Dzmitry Bahdanau, Kyunghyun Cho, and Yoshua Bengio

title: - This paper introduces the attention mechanism, a key component in many unsupervised machine translation models
